about_the_game:
Guess Simulator


Welcome to Goosey Guess, the ultimate guessing game with a delightful goosey twist! Immerse yourself in a captivating 3D environment where dozens, and even hundreds of items materialize before your eyes. Get ready for an addictive and challenging experience that is easy to play but difficult to master. Your challenge? To accurately guess the number of items inside each container and compete on the leaderboard. Are you ready to put your estimation skills to the test?

Notable Features


  • Realistic guessing simulator
  • Twitch integration to allow chat users to play
  • 26 Items
  • 30 Containers
  • Multi-item settings so that up to 4 items appear at a time instead of just 1
  • 3 environments to play in-- Kitchen, Living Room, and Game Room
  • All future content will be free! no DLC besides the soundtrack
  • Prove-it mode to count the items one by one in a grid
  • Multiple difficulties, settings, and controls
  • Over 50 minutes of specially composed music
  • Crisp sound effects and visuals
  • Lots of geese
  • Indie developer that will listen to feedback

Twitch Interactive


Use our Twitch integration to play along with your chat! No setup required-- just enter your Twitch username and click connect from the menu. Begin your stream with a few rounds of Goosey Guess, give a reward to winners for handouts and giveaways, or even to decide what's next on the agenda. You can reward by total points, average points, or for perfect guesses. Two modes are included; the classic "Closest to the amount" and the newly added "Don't go over" so that no points are rewarded for guessing over the total.

4 Development Phases Completed


We have improved the experience tremendously since the launch of Goosey guess, mainly by listening to your feedback. Although we accomplished targeted features such as adding new items, containers, a new scene, and prove-it mode, we also made several changes specifically provided by our users. We have added camera automation, host mode to allow Twitch streamers to play without guessing, an extensive pointing system for Twitch chat, hats for the geese to wear (which were a big hit), and even the idea of naming our Geese, giving us Gary and Gina.

Original Soundtrack


Goosey Guess features an original soundtrack composed exclusively for the game. Renowned composer Kevin Namikata has crafted over 50 minutes of "classical story" music that harmoniously blends with the gameplay, bringing the world of geese and guessing to life. The crisp sound effects and beautiful music work in harmony to create an immersive audio experience that complements the gameplay perfectly.



Join our Discord server for the latest news, to make suggestions, report any problems or ask questions.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10, 11, Vista, XP
  • Processor: 1.4 GHz Intel Dual Core processor / 2 GHz Intel Single Core processor, or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 640 or equivalent with 512MB memory
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Not compatible with vertical displays
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Quad Core Processor
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 or equivalent with 1GB memory
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Not compatible with vertical displays

short_description: Goosey Guess is a guess simulator with a goosey theme! Dozens or even hundreds of items will spawn in a 3D environment and you have to guess how many are in the container. Now Twitch interactive to let chat users participate in the guessing directly on the streamer's game.
